title: 01/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Louis Riddick
itunes:title: 01/18/21 DPS Hour 2 Louis Riddick
description:
Louis Riddick tells Dan that for some reason Eric Bieniemy is not getting looks for a head coaching job. Louis says that he hopes its not about not hiring people that look like you, Louis says there is no other reason for Eric not to get a head coaching job.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Louis Riddick tells Dan that for some reason Eric Bieniemy is not getting looks for a head coaching job. Louis says that he hopes its not about not hiring people that look like you, Louis says there is no other reason for Eric not to get a head coaching job.
